mapper.insert:
insert into tb_sku_test(id, sn, name, price, num, alert_num, image, images, weight, create_time, update_time, spu_id, category_id, category_name, brand_name, spec, sale_num, comment_num, status) values
(#{sku.id}, #{sku.sn}, #{sku.name}, #{sku.price}, #{sku.num}, #{sku.alertNum}, #{sku.image}, #{sku.images}, #{sku.weight}, #{sku.createTime}, #{sku.updateTime}, #{sku.spuId}, #{sku.categoryId} , #{sku.categoryName}, #{sku.brandName}, #{sku.spec}, #{sku.saleNum}, #{sku.commentNum}, #{sku.status})
